Key Match Events: The Yankees beat the Cubs 3-0 at Wrigley Field.
Luis Gil pitched one-hit ball for six shutout innings against the Cubs.
Others: The Yankees farmed out reliever Ron Marinaccio to Triple-A Scranton/Wilkes-Barre after the game.
Scott Effross was optioned to open up a roster spot for Luis Gil, who came off the IL on Friday.
The Yankees are expected to activate reliever Ian Hamilton from the IL on Saturday, likely optioning Phil Bickford to Triple-A.
